data.name: See You In Desolation? Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750TI / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz/AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
